verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:16
verses.text: For what knowest thou, O wife, whether thou shalt save thy husband? or how knowest thou, O man, whether thou shalt save thy wife?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:17
verses.text: But as God hath distributed to every man, as the Lord hath called every one, so let him walk. And so ordain I in all churches.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:18
verses.text: Is any man called being circumcised? let him not become uncircumcised. Is any called in uncircumcision? let him not be circumcised.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:19
verses.text: Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing, but the keeping of the commandments of God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:20
verses.text: Let every man abide in the same calling wherein he was called.
